Description: Limestone ostracon: on one side only, seven lines of an incomplete text containing a prayer for help addressed to Amun.
Curator's comments: Attached to 1912,0210.72 For this genre of texts see e.g. R.A. Caminos, 'Late-Egyptian Miscellanies' (Oxford 1954), pp. 58 and 170; G. Posener, 'Beiträge Bauforschung' 12 (Festschrift Ricke), pp. 59ff.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393033) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393033)
Additional IDs: Other BM number: 1912,0210.72 (This number was originally allocated to EA50732 in the registers. When the two fragments were joined in 1926 this big number was then allocated to a bronze figure.)
Other BM number: EA50732 (This number was originally allocated to 1912,0210.72 in the registers. When the two fragments were joined in 1926 this big number was then allocated to a bronze figure.)
